duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the daily operations and work schedules of the income audit, payroll, and general ledger.
Supervise performance of the Accounting Manager.
Monitor daily operational and flash reports for accuracy and completeness.
Manage the coordination of internal and external audits, and evaluate results to institute procedures and controls related to findings.
Produce financial statements by due date monthly.
Review bank reconciliations monthly and distribute by the due date.
Track permits and licenses for the property.
Maintain cash balances on all bank accounts.
Distribute weekly cash and cash needs report.
Additional duties and projects as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting, CPA preferred
